comment.body:
Unfortunately, yes. This is the only way for the extension because of the Manifest V3 limitations.
However, you have some other options:
- Using another browser like Firefox. For now, they support Manifest V2, so you can update the filters
- Using our [app](https://adguard.com/adguard-windows/overview.html). Besides not having such limitations, it supports more filtering options and is browser-independent, so you can use any one.
